name: DENTON
description: Our protagonist corgi, Denton, was out in the park with his family having a game of fetch. Little did he know that the city’s infamous dog-nappers were on the prowl for new pooches to smuggle for their operations. Unfortunately, Denton is caught while retrieving his ball and is drugged unconscious. Hours later, he woke up to find himself not at home but in a dark room imprisoned in steel. He noticed that his cage wasn’t completely sealed and took the opportunity to escape. Now it’s his mission to return back to his family and aid other trapped pooches from their cells.
